title: What is this font??
content:
I need to know what is this font please

At first thought it was the Mandatory font, but is has differences

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023175136im_/http:/typophile.com/files/19_4594.jpg)

Thanks
author: fas80

comments.content: Mandatory is really close, but you can also try **[UKNumber Plate](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023175136/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=UKNumberPlate%20-%20Regular&fid=8f905be31b8322e6a37971af558585f7&fsize=60&text=19&fit=1)** by Gareth Attrill (2002)
Yes, I also tried with this font UKN, but apparently it is the same to Mandatory
